description: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = Moebius mu(k) (n >= 1, 1<=k<=n).
comments: Row sums = Mertens sequence = A002321; right border = mu(n) = A008683. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 17 2007M * Q as infinite lower triangular matrices; M = (1; 1, 1; 1, 1, 1;...); Q = mu(n) in the main diagonal and the rest zeros. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 17 2007Terms in rows of this table appears to be the values of the minors in the first expansion of the determinant of the Redheffer matrix. [From _Mats Granvik_, Aug 24 2008]
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..125 of triangle, flattened
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (inits)a054527 n k = a054527_tabl !! (n-1) !! (k-1)a054527_row n = a054527_tabl !! (n-1)a054527_tabl = tail $ inits a008683_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 03 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 09 2000
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 03 2008 at the suggestion of R. J. Mathar
